topic.title: LAK SFR CNC: Transport Model Time Steps

para.text: LAK SFR CNC: Transport Model Time Steps
In the transport model, the number of time steps in the stress period is increased to 300. Select "Model|MODFLOW Time" and on the GWT tab, set the number of time steps to 300.

image.title: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box illustrating the specification of 300 time steps for the transport model.
image.caption: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box illustrating the specification of 300 time steps for the transport model.
